meanings.sent1: The lobulose plant had tiny leaf lobes.
meanings.sent2: The lobulose growth on the tree was delicate.
meanings.sent3: The lobulose edges of the pastry made it look like a miniature forest.
meanings.sent4: Her lobulose earrings dangled like tiny leaves in the wind.
meanings.sent5: The lobulose texture of the moss felt like a soft, leafy carpet underfoot.

meanings.definition: Resembling a small lobe or lobule.
meanings.sent1: The lobulose pattern on the fabric looked like tiny circles.
meanings.sent2: The lobulose design on the vase added a unique touch.
meanings.sent3: The lobulose shape of the cloud reminded me of a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: Her lobulose hairstyle framed her face beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The lobulose appearance of the rock formation was fascinating to study.
